title: Assign Bed for Direct Admission
description: A physician's office is directly admitting a patient to the hospital and needs a bed assigned.

tasks.description: Create a pre-admission shell for the patient with their basic demographic and clinical information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a temporary record for the incoming patient.

tasks.description: Identify the required unit type (e.g., 'Telemetry') and find an available bed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds an open bed on the appropriate hospital unit.

tasks.description: Assign the bed to the patient and notify the unit of the incoming direct admission.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reserves the bed and sends a notification to the receiving unit's charge nurse.
